original: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ
corrected: bhadante iti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ

original: Purisarūpaṁ, bhikkhave, itthiyā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhave itthiyā cittam pariyādāya tiṭṭhati iti
corrected: Purisarūpaṁ bhikkhave itthiyā cittam pariyādāya tiṭṭhati iti

original: vā ñassati ubhayatthaṁ vā ñassati uttariṁ vā manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanavisesaṁ
analyzed: vā ñassati ubhayattham vā ñassati uttarim vā manussa dhammā
corrected: vā ñassati ubhayattham vā ñassati uttarim vā manussa dhammā alamariya ñāṇa dassana visesam

original: vā ñassati ubhayatthaṁ vā ñassati uttariṁ vā manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanavisesaṁ
analyzed: vā ñassati ubhayattham vā ñassati uttarim vā manussa dhammā
corrected: vā ñassati ubhayattham vā ñassati uttarim vā manussa dhammā alamariya ñāṇa dassana visesam

original: Tañca kho āgantukehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhan”ti.
analyzed: tat ca kho āgantukehi upakkilesehi
corrected: tat ca kho āgantukehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhan ti

original: Tañca kho āgantukehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṁ.
analyzed: tat ca kho āgantukehi upakkilesehi
corrected: tat ca kho āgantukehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṁ

original: uppannā vā bojjhaṅgā na bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti yathayidaṁ, bhikkhave, ayonisomanasikāro.
analyzed: uppannāḥ vā bojjhaṅgāḥ na bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti a yoniso manasikāro
corrected: uppannā vā bojjhaṅgā na bhāvanā pāripūriṁ gacchanti yathayidaṁ bhikkhave ayoniso manasikāro

original: “Ajjhattikaṁ, bhikkhave, aṅganti karitvā nāññaṁ ekaṅgampi samanupassāmi yaṁ evaṁ mahato anatthāya saṁvattati yathayidaṁ, bhikkhave, pamādo.
analyzed: bhikkhave aṅga nti karitvā na aññam eka aṅgam pi samanupassāmi yam evam mahataḥ anatthāya savattati bhikkhave pamādaḥ
corrected: Ajjhattikam bhikkhave aṅga nti karitvā na aññam eka aṅgam pi samanupassāmi yam evam mahato anatthāya samvattati yathayidam bhikkhave pamādo

original: “Ajjhattikaṁ, bhikkhave, aṅganti karitvā nāññaṁ ekaṅgampi samanupassāmi yaṁ evaṁ mahato atthāya saṁvattati yathayidaṁ, bhikkhave, appamādo.
analyzed: bhikkhave aṅga nti karitvā na aññam eka aṅgam pi samanupassāmi yam evam mahataḥ atthāya savattati bhikkhave appamādaḥ
corrected: Ajjhattikam bhikkhave aṅga nti karitvā na aññam eka aṅgam pi samanupassāmi yam evam mahato atthāya samvattati yathayidam bhikkhave appamādo

original: “Ajjhattikaṁ, bhikkhave, aṅganti karitvā nāññaṁ ekaṅgampi samanupassāmi yaṁ evaṁ mahato anatthāya saṁvattati yathayidaṁ, bhikkhave, kosajjaṁ.
analyzed: bhikkhave aṅga nti karitvā na aññam eka aṅgam pi samanupassāmi yam evam mahataḥ anatthāya savattati bhikkhave kosajja
corrected: Ajjhattikam bhikkhave aṅga nti karitvā na aññam eka aṅgam pi samanupassāmi yam evam mahato anatthāya samvattati yathayidam bhikkhave kosajjam

original: “Ajjhattikaṁ, bhikkhave, aṅganti karitvā nāññaṁ ekaṅgampi samanupassāmi yaṁ evaṁ mahato atthāya saṁvattati yathayidaṁ, bhikkhave, vīriyārambho.
analyzed: bhikkhave aṅga nti karitvā na aññam eka aṅgam pi samanupassāmi yam evam mahataḥ atthāya savattati bhikkhave vīriya ārambhaḥ
corrected: Ajjhattikam bhikkhave aṅga nti karitvā na aññam eka aṅgam pi samanupassāmi yam evam mahato atthāya samvattati yathayidam bhikkhave vīriya ārambho

original: … santuṭṭhitā … ayonisomanasikāro … yonisomanasikāro … asampajaññaṁ … sampajaññaṁ … dvādasamaṁ.
analyzed: santuṭṭhi tā a yonisomanasikāraḥ yonisomanasikāraḥ a sampajaññam sampajaññam
corrected: santuṭṭhi tā a yonisomanasikāro yonisomanasikāro a sampajaññaṁ sampajaññaṁ dvādasamaṁ

original: “Etadaggaṁ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ rattaññūnaṁ yadidaṁ aññāsikoṇḍañño.
analyzed: etat agga bhikkhave mama sāvakānam bhikkhūnam rattaññūnam yat idam
corrected: etad aggam bhikkhave mama sāvakānam bhikkhūnam rattaññūnam yad idam aññāsikoṇḍañño

original: … Paṭhamaṁ salākaṁ gaṇhantānaṁ yadidaṁ kuṇḍadhāno.
analyzed: paṭhamam salākam yat idam kuṇḍadhāno
corrected: paṭhamam salākam gaṇhantānam yat idam kuṇḍadhāno

original: … Khippābhiññānaṁ yadidaṁ bāhiyo dārucīriyo.
analyzed: khippa abhiññānam yat idam bāhiyaḥ dārucīriyaḥ
corrected: khippa abhiññānaṁ yad idaṁ bāhiyo dārucīriyo

original: … Dhitimantānaṁ yadidaṁ ānando.
analyzed: dhiti mantānam yat idam ānandaḥ
corrected: dhitimantānaṁ yad idaṁ ānando

original: … Dāyakānaṁ yadidaṁ sudatto gahapati anāthapiṇḍiko.
analyzed: yat idam sudattaḥ gahapati anāthapiṇḍikaḥ
corrected: Dāyakānaṁ yat idam sudattaḥ gahapati anāthapiṇḍikaḥ

original: … Paṇītadāyakānaṁ yadidaṁ mahānāmo sakko.
analyzed: paṇīta dāyakānam yat idam mahānāmaḥ sakkaḥ
corrected: paṇīta dāyakānam yad idam mahānāmo sakko

original: Dhammānussati …pe… saṅghānussati … sīlānussati … cāgānussati … devatānussati … ānāpānassati … maraṇassati … kāyagatāsati … upasamānussati.
analyzed: dhamma anussati pe saṅgha anussati sīla anussati cāga anussati devatā anussati āna apāna ssati maraṇa ssati kāyagata asati upasama anussati
corrected: dhamma anussati pe saṅgha anussati sīla anussati cāga anussati devatā anussati ānāpāna ssati maraṇa ssati kāyagata sati upasama anussati

original: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye annaggarasaggānaṁ na lābhino, uñchena kapālābhatena yāpenti.
analyzed: atha khalu ete iva sattāḥ bahutarāḥ ye na lābhinaḥ uñchena kapālābhatena yāpenti
corrected: atha kho ete va sattā bahutarā ye annaggarasaggānaṁ na lābhino uñchena kapālābhatena yāpenti
